ee nisa janadhipathi thumatath agamathi thumatath api tharaye kiyanawa apita dan pallayata yanna alath na , udata enna daluth na…ee nisa porondu wuna widihata rakiya denna naththam uya mahathwarunge oya aayathanawala gettu parissan kara ganna mokada api nawathath enene yanna neme oya thanwala padinchi wennayi api enne.

mudalali.....mehe waren ******yosadde ahichcha purupuruyi, malukattayi athulu kollo set eka dom eka athulata duwala yaddith layimol mudalaliwa allagena ambanaka nelanawalu.passe kattiya ekathu wela amaruwen mudalaliwa gutikamen beragaththalu.balinnan layimol thamange kabad eka kadima gana saka karala thiyenne mudalaliwa.mokada eeta kalin dawase me denna athare mokadda ekakata loku bahinbaswimak wela thiyanawa.aththatama mudalali rathri praharaka balakaye membar kenek wunata layimolge kabad eka kadana wadeta sahabhagi wune na.ithin mudalali thamange nidosbawa kochchara kiwwath layimol neweyi eeka piligaththe.eeta passe lod kok idiripathwela aththatama wechcha siddiya mansta kiwwalu.ee wagema mita passe thamange dewal dom eke anith ayath ekka bedahadagannayi kiyalath mansta upades labunalu.eeth me dewal ekakwath layimol kanakata gaththe na.aththa kathawa ahuwata passewath layimolge hithe mudalali gana thibuna tharaha nathiwune na.pora eetapasse kiwwe me wade mudalalige lidarship eka yatathe rathri praharaka balakaya karapu wadak kiyala.ithin layimol dawasa thissema kale paththaka hitapu mudalalige hathmuthu paramparawatama pin didi hitapu eka.ee wagema labana aathme mudalali athulu rathri praharaka balakaya kunugodaka ipadewa kiyalath layimol kattiyata sapa kirimak kalalu.ithin eda ra weddi mudalali hitiye harima hithe amaruwen.dinar eken passe purupuruwa hambawechcha mudalali, eda rata layimolta gemak denna oone bawa kiwwalu.thamanta arawage deyak kiwwata passeth, layimolta gemak dima gana rathri praharaka balakayata deparak hitha hitha inna oone wune na.ithin kattiya ee welawema gemata bassalu.mulinma thibune plan kirima saha oththu balima.ithin buddhi ansha pradhani malukatta oththu balana athare anith kattiya gem eka plan kalalu.plan eke hatiyata gema denna niyamitha wune maha rata.ee kiyanne let stadi iwara wela kattiya nidagaththata passe.kohomahari ithin ape yaluwo tika balaporoththuwen hitapu welawath udawunalu.dan dom eke layit ehema oof karala kattiya gorawa gorawa nidi.ithin ape rathri praharaka balakayath supurudu widihata ras wunalu.plan eke hatiyata mulinma karanna thibune layimol ada pitin ussagena gihin kunuwala lagin thiyana eka.ithin me wadeta kalin layimolge adata dala thiyana net eka galawanna oone.ee wade pawarune mudalalita.mudalalith thamange shilpa okkoma dala layimolwa nagittenne nathiwenna net eka galewwalu.eeta passe thibune ada ussagena yana wade.dan ada uda layimoluth inna nisa eeka sahena barayi.ee madiwata ada helawenne nathiwa ussan yannath oone.ithin me wade pawarune purupuru, wanniya, bore saha amandanandata.ape yaluwo hatharadenath thamanta pawaruna wade akuratama ishta kalalu.eeke prathipalayak widihata tika welawakata passe layimol nidagena hitiye hostal eke kunuwala addaramayi.ithin rathri praharaka balakaya kunuwalaka upaddawanna sapa karapu layimolta eda ra siddawune kunuwalak lagama nidaganna.eeta passe rathri praharaka balakaya kale layimol hamadamath aadaraya karapu mansge kabad ekath ussagena awith ada laginma thiyapu eka.habayi rathri praharaka balakaya danagena hitiya kunuwale gadatayi, ra hithalatayi tika welawak yaddi layimolta nagittawenawayi kiyala.eeka nisama thamayi ape yaluwo kattiya thawath plan ekak lasthi karala thibune.ithin ee plan ekata anuwa kattiya dom eke dora bageta wahala, dore dare udin plastik boga bakat ekak radewwalu.nikamma neweyi, hodata wathurath purawala.ithin balaporoththu wechcha widihatama layimolta tika welawakin aharunalu.mans balanna athi oluwata udin wenada thiyena silima wenuwata tharu thiyenne ayi kiyala.ee madiwata dom eka athule kunu walak???

hitapu widya ha thakshana amathyathuma widiyata mama kiyannath santhoshayi, pas awurudu widya thakshana nawothpadana wada piliwalek sakas karala janadhipathithumata idiripath karanna mata puluwan wunaya kiyana eka.ethumata eeka idiripath kalata pasuwa mama kabinat ekatath eeka idiripath kala.
oba chithrapataye adhyakshanaya wagema pradhana naluwa.
